sourcesContent:
function Produto(props) { return
{props.nome} {new Intl.NumberFormat('pt-BR', {style:'currency', currency: 'BRL'}).format(props.vlTotal)}
{new Intl.NumberFormat('pt-BR', {style:'currency', currency: 'BRL'}).format(props.qtd)} x {new Intl.NumberFormat('pt-BR', {style:'currency', currency: 'BRL'}).format(props.vlUnitario)}
} export default Produto;
